channel.title: Countdowns on Josef Spjut
channel.description: Recent content in Countdowns on Josef Spjut

item.title: Wedding Countdown
item.description: We get married in ! That's // Turn on Bootstrap $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip(); // Hopefully this UTC thing will compensate for different local time zones // Because it's EST, it's actually 4pm UTC, not 3pm like it would be for EDT var $returntime = new Date(Date.UTC(2015, 11, 12, 16, 0, 0)) // var $returntime = "2015/9/12/22:45" var $clock = $('#clock'); $clock.countdown($returntime, function(event) { $(this).html(event.strftime('%D days %H hours %M minutes and %S seconds')); }); var $clock2 = $('#clock-hours'); $clock2.

item.title: Audrey Countdown
item.description: Audrey returns from her trip in ! That's // Turn on Bootstrap $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip(); // Hopefully this UTC thing will compensate for different local time zones var $returntime = new Date(Date.UTC(2015, 8, 13, 2, 45, 0)) // var $returntime = "2015/9/12/22:45" var $clock = $('#clock'); $clock.countdown($returntime, function(event) { $(this).html(event.strftime('%D days %H hours %M minutes and %S seconds')); }); var $clock2 = $('#clock-hours'); $clock2.countdown($returntime, function(event) { var $totalHours = event.
